Description:
Responsible for the standard cleaning of guest rooms.
Carrying out cleaning activities for maintaining guest rooms and other tasks to ensure cleanliness.
Evaluate the cleaning supplies, room maintenance guidelines, and customer comfort levels and inform any complications to the supervisor.
Use cleaning materials according to the specified instructions and maintain guest rooms to meet guest satisfaction levels.Skills
Skills:
The ability to work under pressure.
Skilled in the variety of tasks handled by a housekeeper and proven professional work experience to carry out day-to-day duties efficiently.
Experienced in executive housekeeping duties to satisfy customers and adhere to the standard quality and hospitality regulations of the premises.
Efficient in housekeeping responsibilities like cleaning rooms, catering to customer requests, and following instructions by an immediate supervisor.
